channel.title: INfinance
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INfinance, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: ‘I’m considering driving Lyft part time’: I’m 58 with a $1 million home. Do I finally give up work and enjoy life?
item.description: “One thought is for me to stop working at age 60, while my wife continues for two more years at her teaching job.”

item.title: ‘Fifty Shades of Grey’ author E.L. James lists her L.A. mansion for $7.25 million
item.description: Author E.L. James has put her sprawling Los Angeles home on the market for $7.25 million—having slashed a staggering $1 million from her original aski...

item.title: ‘I don’t want to step on any toes’: I manage an $80K trust for a 15-year-old relative. How do I deal with interfering relatives?
item.description: “I also want to teach my young relative good money habits without overstepping the parents’ authority.”

item.title: My mom, 90, has dementia. My brother wants her to buy a $500K house near his house. Does that make any sense?
item.description: “I can’t, for the life of me, see how this makes sense on any level — personal or financial.”

item.title: Is the stock market open on MLK Day? Does the post office deliver mail?
item.description: The Monday holiday commemorates the birth of civil rights leader Martin Luther King Jr.

item.title: DeepSeek Won't Sink U.S. AI Titans
item.description: Panic fueling the selloff of Nvidia, Broadcom and other tech giants is overblown.

item.title: Arabica Coffee Prices Hit Record on U.S., Colombia Tariff Spat
item.description: Arabica coffee prices hit a record level, as traders digested the withdrawal of President Trump’s threats to impose tariffs and economic sanctions on ...

item.title: Comex Gold, Silver Settle Lower
item.description: Gold settled 1.4% lower, down two of the past three sessions, and silver fell 2.5%, down three of the past four sessions.

item.title: Stocks Sink in Broad AI Rout Sparked by China's DeepSeek
item.description: U.S. stocks were mostly lower, with the Nasdaq leading declines as makers of AI infrastructure suffered steep falls, many in the double digits. Nvidia...

item.title: Financial Services Roundup: Market Talk
item.description: Gain insight on Experian, SoFi Technologies and more in the latest Market Talks covering Financial Services.
